about.title: About Me
about.years_sk: I have been living in Slovakia for over 6 years and have thoroughly studied the local market and its specifics.
about.knowledge: I know exactly what digital product to create and how to promote it for the maximum success of your business.
about.pride_desc: Experience working with freelancers on the business side allowed me to identify the main pain point of cooperation: a large amount of time spent by company management writing a detailed technical specification to describe all business processes and expectations from the site. I never require a complex TS from the client and will propose the best solution for approval myself.

steps.request_desc: Leave a request via the form and I will contact you as soon as possible.
steps.meeting_desc: We will meet in Bratislava / online to discuss project details and your expectations.
